author: Tom Carreras, Stephen Alpher
title: PTSD-Afflicted Crypto Investors Hit the Sell Button After Circle's Euphoric IPO
description: Coinbase's April 2021 debut marked what was then an epic price top for bitcoin.
content:
Is it 2021 all over again?
Circle (CRCL) debuted to wild upside action on the New York Stock Exchange on Thursday, its shares more than tripling from the IPO price of $31. The event was the culminat… [+1469 chars]
